Content:: Adikari Mudiyanselage Somapala Adikari (24 November 1935 - 14 December 2015) was a Sri Lankan politician. He was the Minister of Posts and Telecommunications, Minister of Tourism and the member of Parliament of Sri Lanka from Kalawewa representing the United National Party.[1][2] Adikari was elected to parliament from Kalawewa in a by election in 1974 following the death of R. B. Ratnamalala. He was re-elected 1977 general election. *Appointed MPs were abolished in 1972 by the First Republican Constitution
Title: A. M. S. Adikari - Wikipedia
